title: Error66: "@r7-3-M155"
content:
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:turbo-vision-dark]]
[[=]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:memetic-killagent-archive/COMS]]
+ COMS:
++ //_Error66_/

##red|ALERT: Unauthorized Access Detected.##

##red|Date: [21-07-2024]##
##red|Time: [17:06]##
##red|Location: [SCiPnet-999]##

##red|Details:##
##red|Suspicious activity has been detected on the database. The following anomalies were identified:##
##red|- Multiple failed login attempts.##
##red|- Unusual IP address: [REDACTED]##
##red|- Access to restricted files/folders.##

##red|Immediate Actions Required for Data Recovery—##
@@ @@
@@ @@
----
@@ @@
@@ @@
//Heyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy!!!!!!_//
@@ @@
@@ @@
//Ummm...._//
@@ @@
@@ @@
//It's-A-meeeeeeee!!!_//
@@ @@
@@ @@
//Art-"E"-Miss._//
@@ @@
@@ @@
//Youngest member of the AWCY._//
@@ @@
@@ @@
//Gotta say you guys got a preeeetty terrible cybersecurity team._//
@@ @@
@@ @@
//I mean, I'm not even f#cking 20 yet and I got into the database my dad called was "off-limits" for me._//
@@ @@
@@ @@
...
@@ @@
@@ @@
//S.C.P Foundation?_//
@@ @@
@@ @@
//Pffffffffffftttt._//
@@ @@
//Ass See Pee Foundation?_//
@@ @@
@@ @@
//More like.... Suckers Can't Paint Foundation._//
@@ @@
@@ @@
//Lawwl.//
@@ @@
@@ @@
//Allow me to introduce my speciality. I don't need conventional art supplies to create amazing artworks._//
@@ @@
@@ @@
//I can command my keyboard to do this:_//
_
*/char type: @/
art_style: graffiti
text prompt: scp_

[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:error66-r7-3-m155/SCP%20graffiti%20logo]]
@@ @@
//Like it??????//
@@ @@
@@ @@
//Here are some more "text-works" I made of some prominent files in your database, the last one was kinda creeeepy tho, almost gave me a heart attack._//
@@ @@
//Dad's gonna be soooooo prouuud.//
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:error66-r7-3-m155/173]]
SCP-173_
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:error66-r7-3-m155/106]]
SCP-106_
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:error66-r7-3-m155/131]]
SCP-131_
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:error66-r7-3-m155/096]]
SCP-096_
@@ @@
@@ @@
-----
+ COMS:
##black|print(## ##green|"Please wait while we initiate data recovery procedures and trace the unauthorized user."##
    ##black|time.sleep(2)##
    ##black|print("\n")##

##black|def initiate_data_recovery():
    print(## ##green|"Initiating data recovery procedure..."##
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:error66-r7-3-m155/4v3nl33]]

    ##black|time.sleep(1)##
    ##black|Simulate data recovery process
    print(## ##green|"Restoring data from backups..."##
    ##black|time.sleep(3)##
    ##black|print(## ##green|"Data recovery completed."##
@@ @@
##black|def trace_unauthorized_user():
    print(## ##green|"Tracing unauthorized user..."##
    ##black|time.sleep(1)##
    ##green|"Analyzing system logs..."##
    ##black|time.sleep(2)
    print(## ##green|"Identifying unauthorized access points..."##
    ##black|time.sleep(2)##
    ##black|print(## ##green|"Unauthorized user traced successfully."##

@@ @@
@@ @@
   ##green|[Error66_ has been successfully resolved.]##

##black|def main():
    display_security_message()
    initiate_data_recovery()
    trace_unauthorized_user()
    print(## ##green|"All procedures completed. Please contact IT Security Team for further assistance."##
[[/=]]
----

**Note:** //"Site-999's data security software was temporarily inactive due to ongoing server updates."//

//"Unexpectedly, a teenager attempted to infiltrate the system."//

//"Fortunately, the files remained secure. The infiltrator accessed one of my online art galleries and converted my artworks into ASCII images. While this is technically impressive, it still constitutes theft."//

//"It's disappointing to see art theft occurring even within the largest community of anomalous artists.... What a shame."//

//"Father won't be proud, Alyssa."// –Dr. Avenlee

[[=]]
**[Dr. Avenlee has logged off.]**
[[/=]]
author: Dr Avenlee
